## How Data were imported:

1. Download [HWSD_RASTER.zip](http://webarchive.iiasa.ac.at/Research/LUC/External-World-soil-database/HWSD_Data/HWSD_RASTER.zip) from [HWSD](http://webarchive.iiasa.ac.at/Research/LUC/External-World-soil-database/HTML/HWSD_Data.html?sb=4) and extract.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
download.file("http://webarchive.iiasa.ac.at/Research/LUC/External-World-soil-database/HWSD_Data/HWSD_RASTER.zip", destfile=tempfile())
unzip(tempfile(), exdir=system.file("extdata", package = "rhwsd"))
require(raster)
hwsd <- raster(system.file("extdata/hwsd.bil", package = "rhwsd"))
```

For my local compi:
```{r}
hwsd <- raster("~/data/hwsd/HWSD_RASTER/hwsd.bil")
proj4string(hwsd) <- "+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +ellps=WGS84 +towgs84=0,0,0"

df_lonlat <- tibble(lon = -88, lat = 44)
df_lonlat <- raster::extract(
      hwsd, 
      sp::SpatialPoints(df_lonlat), # , proj4string = rasta@crs
      sp = TRUE
      ) %>%
    as_tibble() %>%
    tidyr::nest(data = c(-lon, -lat)) %>%
    right_join(df_lonlat, by = c("lon", "lat")) %>%
    mutate( data = purrr::map(data, ~dplyr::slice(., 1)) ) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(data = purrr::map(data, ~t(.))) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(data = purrr::map(data, ~as_tibble(.)))
```

## A quick example:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(rhwsd)
con <- get.hwsd.con()
ans <- get.hwsd(abox = c(44, 44.5, -88.5, -88), con = con, hwsd.bil = "~/data/hwsd/HWSD_RASTER/hwsd.bil")
ans <- get.hwsd(lat = 44, lon = -88, gridsize = 0.1, con = con, hwsd.bil = "~/data/hwsd/HWSD_RASTER/hwsd.bil")
```
